nodes.text: [A massive insectoid creature—8 feet tall with glowing red eyes—emerges from the foliage. Its wings buzz like thunder. It's the first boss.]

choices.text: Grab a bone from the ground and fight.

nodes.text: [How are you going to do with your weapon?]

choices.text: Dodge and aim for the wings

nodes.text: [You shatter a leg—but the creature impales you instantly.  Ending: DEAD]
[You cripple its flight but are badly hurt. Believing you dead, the creature leaves. You black out. When you wake, you’re in a bed in a small town, saved by someone unknown. Ending: Reach town]
[A cloud of shimmering spores bursts around you. You stumble and collapse, overcome by vivid hallucinations of your home planet… forever. DEAD]

[You follow a dim corridor to a clearing where a glowing plant and a stone pedestal await. A relic hums within. As you take it, the cave splits: one path echoes with dripping water, the other glows with warm, vine-covered walls.]
[You emerge from the cave and stumble upon a mysterious alien town. Strange eyes watch you from the shadows. Ending: Reached Town]
[The vines wrap tighter around you the deeper you go. Suddenly, the ground gives way—you fall into a pit of writhing roots and vanish into the dark. Ending: DEAD]
